summary.para: Provides a set of configuration options you can use to customize the settings used when starting a Cloud Build.
The specific version of the Operating System to build your project on.
The BuildTarget of the Build Profile to be built in the cloud.
The Id of the Build Automation credentials to use to sign your cloud build.
The specs of the machine used to build your project in the Cloud.
The family of Operating System Build Automation will use to build your project on.
The specific version of the Operating System to use when building your project in the cloud.
Whether to use Silicon or Intel version of the Unity Editor.
The version of Xcode to use when building your project in the cloud.
